name: the art of plagiarism
description:
In all directions, for all time sprawls a gallery filled with unique works. Observe, take, and create to your mind's content. A museum goer always wished to take a little something home, no?

_____________________________________________________________

Controls:

⌨️WASD - Walk around.

🖱️Mouse - Look around.

👆Left Click - Steal a piece.

📑Tab - Gaze upon your collection.
